name: Onion Kidd
description:
This is a simple 2D platformer with local multiplayer support.

The game runs fine in RetroArch and Ludo, using Lutro game engine, and supports savestates.

Keyboard controls:

  • Z and X to jump and attack
  • Enter to Start

There is not a lot of content in the game, but you can add some levels easily.

The source code is available on Github.

Background music is from Labbed.
